backend/main.mo: Motoko canister defining user profiles, balances, credit purchases, BTC transfer requests, admin authorization, and blockchain verification logic.
feature_evidence.json: Empty feature evidence report placeholder containing a 'features' array.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Text file listing short summaries for all frontend source files including pages, components, hooks, and configuration.
frontend/index.css: Global Tailwind base/theme CSS defining OKLCH color variables for light and dark modes.
frontend/index.html: Basic HTML entry point loading the React SPA via main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React router setup with auth gating, admin auto-redirect logic, and initial data refresh behavior.
frontend/src/components/auth/AdminAccess: UI screen showing admin verification progress with elapsed timer and retry/sign-out actions.
frontend/src/components/auth/LoginButton: Login/logout button that manages Internet Identity authentication and clears cached admin/query state.
frontend/src/components/auth/ProfileSetu: Modal prompting new users to enter and save their name during profile initialization.
frontend/src/components/layout/AppHeader: Navigation header showing links, login button, user greeting, and mobile menu with optional admin link.
frontend/src/components/layout/AppLayout: Page layout wrapper including header, main content area, and a footer with attribution.
frontend/src/components/transfers/Transf: Renders a table of transactions with type badges, timestamps, amounts, and verify actions, plus an empty-state view.
frontend/src/components/transfers/Verify: Dialog for verifying a transfer request by submitting a blockchain transaction ID and displaying request status.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and caches a backend actor tied to the user's identity and invalidates dependent queries when it changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Context and hooks for managing Internet Identity authentication, login state, and stored identities.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: React Query hooks for fetching and mutating user profile, balance, admin status, and transfer-related data using the actor.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind layers plus custom theme variables for light and dark mode, and adds reusable component styles like financial cards and stat text.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app, wrapping it with React Query and Internet Identity providers.
Displays verified admin info including principal, balance, and a list of admin capabilities with navigation to the admin panel.
frontend/src/pages/AdminPage.tsx: Provides admin tools for viewing balance, transferring credits, validating principals, and viewing admin-related transaction history.
frontend/src/pages/BuyCreditsPage.tsx: Allows users to submit a Bitcoin transaction ID and amount to purchase credits, showing balance and purchase status.
frontend/src/pages/DashboardPage.tsx: Shows user balance, quick stats, recent transactions, and shortcuts to buy or send BTC.
frontend/src/pages/HistoryPage.tsx: Displays full transaction history with categorized credit/debit summaries and a detailed transactions table.
frontend/src/pages/SendBtcPage.tsx: React page for sending BTC that handles input, fee estimation, balance checks, and submitting transfer requests.
frontend/src/utils/adminStatusCache.ts: Utility for caching per-principal admin status in localStorage with TTL and helpers to get, set, and clear entries.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Helpers for reading URL parameters, persisting them in sessionStorage, and removing params from hash routing.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration defining theme extensions, colors, fonts, animations, and plugin setup.
project_state.json: Project metadata describing app purpose, architecture notes, features, and known issues.
